languages.text: Формула {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчета урона{/g} с учетом защиты от {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} выглядит так: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g})) × (1 − (({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}) / 100))) {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Бонусы{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g}, влияющие на урон, включая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, суммируются до вычисления защиты от урона.
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from damage, looks like this: Damage = [Damage calculation with all multipliers — (Damage Deflection — Deflection Penetration)] × [1 — ((Armour — Armour Penetration)/100)] Damage bonuses and penalties, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}Critical Damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: Формула {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчета урона{/g} с учетом защиты от урона выглядит так: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − (отражение урона − пробитие отражения)) × (1 − ((броня − пробитие брони) / 100))) Бонусы и штрафы, влияющие на урон, включая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критический урон{/g}, суммируются до вычисления защиты от урона.

Формула {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчета урона{/g} с учетом защиты от урона выглядит так: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − (отражение урона − пробитие отражения)) × (1 − ((броня − пробитие брони) / 100))) Бонусы и штрафы, влияющие на урон, включая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критический урон{/g}, суммируются до вычисления защиты от урона.

languages.text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.
languages.original_text: Формула {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчета урона{/g} с учетом защиты от {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} выглядит так: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g})) × (1 − (({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}) / 100))) {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Бонусы{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g}, влияющие на урон, включая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, суммируются до вычисления защиты от урона.

traits.locale_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from damage, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers – (deflection − deflection negation)) × (1 − (armour − armour penetration/100)). Damage bonuses and penalties, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

languages.text: Die Formel für die {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schadensberechnung{/g}, die den Schutz vor {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} berücksichtigt, sieht wie folgt aus: Schaden = (Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren — ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Ablenkungsnegierung{/g})) × (1 — ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}/100)). {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Schadensboni{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}-abzüge{/g} einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} werden addiert, bevor Schutz vor Schaden berechnet wird.
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: Die Formel für die {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schadensberechnung{/g}, die den Schutz vor Schaden berücksichtigt, sieht wie folgt aus: Schaden = (Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflektionsnegierung{/g})) × (1 – ({g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}/100)). {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Schadensboni{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}-abzüge{/g} einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Schaden{/g} werden addiert, bevor {g|Encyclopedia:DamageProtection}Schutz vor Schaden{/g} berechnet wird.

languages.text: La formule de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}calcul des dégâts{/g}, qui tient compte de la protection contre les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, est la suivante : dégâts = (calcul des dégâts avec tous les modificateurs − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g})) × (1− ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}− {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} / 100)). Les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts et les {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g}, y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} sont additionnés avant le calcul de protection contre les dégâts.
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: La formule de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}calcul des dégâts{/g}, qui tient compte de la protection contre les dégâts, est la suivante : dégâts = (calcul des dégâts avec tous les multiplicateurs - ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} - {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g}))  × (1 - ({g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} -- {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} / 100)). Les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts et les {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g}, y compris les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} sont additionnés préalablement du calcul de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageProtection}protection contre les dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}计算的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}公式{/g}如下（包含伤害防护因素）： 伤害=（（所有伤害因素造成的总伤害-（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}））×（1 −（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）/100）。 所有伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}在内，都是在伤害防护之前进行计算的。
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害计算{/g}的公式如下（包含伤害防护因素）： 伤害=（（所有伤害因素造成的总伤害-（偏转-偏转穿透））×（1-（护甲-护甲穿透）/100）。 所有伤害加值与减值，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}在内，都是在伤害防护之前进行计算的。

languages.text: La fórmula para el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}cálculo del daño{/g}, teniendo en cuenta la protección contra el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, es esta: daño = (cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}) / 100)). Las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} al daño, incluyendo el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, se suman antes del cálculo de la protección contra el daño.
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: La fórmula para el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}cálculo del daño{/g}, teniendo en cuenta la protección contra el daño, es esta: daño = (cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores – (desvío − negación de desvío)) × (1 − (armadura − penetración de armadura) / 100)). Las bonificaciones y penalizaciones al daño, incluyendo el {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g}, se suman antes del cálculo de la protección contra el daño.

languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from damage, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers – (deflection − deflection negation)) × (1 − (armour − armour penetration/100)). Damage bonuses and penalties, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ計算{/g}の式は、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}からの防御を考慮し、以下の通りとする。 ダメージ＝（全ての乗算のダメージ計算−（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}－{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}））×（1−（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}−{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}/100）） {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を含むダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}はダメージ防御を計算する前に合計する。
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ計算{/g}の式は、ダメージからの防御を考慮し、以下の通りとする。 ダメージ＝（全ての乗算のダメージ計算−（ディフレクション－ディフレクション無効化））×（1−（アーマー－アーマー貫通/100）） {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を含むダメージボーナスとペナルティはダメージ防御を計算する前に合計する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Hasardan{/g} korunmayı da göz önünde bulunduran {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Hasar hesaplama{/g} formülü şu şekildedir: Hasar = (Tüm çarpanlarla hasar hesaplaması − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Saptırma{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Saptırma yadsıması{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Zırh{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Zırh delme{/g}/100)). {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritik hasar{/g} da dâhil edilmek üzere hasar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusları{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanları{/g}, hasardan korunma hesaplanmadan önce birbiriyle toplanır.
languages.original_text: The formula for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage calculation{/g}, taking into account protection from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, looks like this: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}/100)). Damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, including {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, are added together before damage protection is calculated.
